infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take photos of potholes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to select photos of potholes.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to report pothole locations and verify damage locations on the map.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Roads Authority to use your location to report pothole locations and verify damage locations on the map.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you select pothole images and read location data from photos.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos of potholes.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Roads Authority to access photo location data to help determine damage locations.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow Roads Authority to save photos of road damage.
